title: Rescue the Grand Duke
content:
ll find the Grand Duke, Gortash, and Orin and Ketheric Thorm. As you witness the scene, your journals will be updated.

Pursue Ravengard's captors to Baldur's Gate.

Grand Duke Ravengard was infected with an illithid tadpole, and taken to Baldur's Gate.

You will need to follow him to the next location once you reach Baldur's Gate in Act 3. Progress through the main story questlines until you enter Baldur's Gate.
